GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18.3 to before v5.18.8
GSD.description:
f2fs: attach inline_data after setting compression

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit 204afc116ceef66dc93e71a7adea708d6d9a725c, it was introduced in version v5.18.3 by commit 198fd9faa271dd54dca6fc8eb6873f42dfd3b4d8. For more details please see the references link.
